item.title: Large-scale analyses of the relationship between sex, age and intelligence quotient heterogeneity and cortical morphometry in autism spectrum disorder
Imaging sex/gender and autism in the brain: Etiological implications
Atypically rightward cerebral asymmetry in male adults with autism stratifies individuals with and without language delay
